title: If there is no data for series, it should display a friendly error message
OB: When there is no data for the selected series in the chart, no error message is displayed and the chart remains unchanged.
EB: When there is no data for the selected series in the chart, a friendly error message should be displayed to alert the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a chart. 2. Set the data definition. 3. Select a column that does not have any data.
